ch.nolix.core.validator

Class DoubleMediator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.validator.DoubleMediator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtendedDoubleMediator

    public class DoubleMediator
extends java.lang.Object
    A double mediator is a mediator for a double. A double mediator is not mutable.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
